headline: McCormick Appoints Gavin Hattersley and Rick Dierker to Board of Directors
summary: McCormick & Company, Incorporated (NYSE: MKC), a global leader in flavor, today announced that Gavin Hattersley, retired President and Chief Executive Officer of Molson Coors Beverage Company, and Rick Dierker, President and Chief Executive Officer of Church & Dwight Co., Inc., have been appointed to McCormick's Board of Directors effective February 1, 2026.
